document.full_text: the chance to win olympic gold may only come along once every four years but for the boston bruins and vancouver canucks the opportunity to win a stanley cup is an unmatched once-in-a-lifetime experience.
document.title: stanley cup trumps olympic gold, say players
lines_and_colors: the chance to win olympic gold may only come along once every four years but for the boston bruins and vancouver canucks the opportunity to win a stanley cup is an unmatched once-in-a-lifetime experience.
